'''Grand Narukami Shrine Omamori''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Blind Loyalty, Reckless Courage}}.

==Trivia==
* When the omamori is first given by [[Yae Miko]] in [[Blind Loyalty, Reckless Courage]], it has a quality of 1★. The Traveler uses the omamori in [[The Omnipresent God]], and upon completion of [[Wishes (Quest)|Wishes]], the quality increases to 4★ [[Grand Narukami Shrine Omamori (Wishes)|Grand Narukami Shrine Omamori]] and the description changes.
* The characters on the item are written in the [[Inazuma Language]] and read {{Script|inazuma|OMR|omamori}}.
* {{w|Omamori}} (御守 or お守り) are Japanese amulets commonly sold at Shinto shrines and Buddhist temples, dedicated to particular Shinto kami as well as Buddhist figures, and are said to provide various forms of luck or protection.
